figure_1:
aFour participants were not offered the open label phase because of behaviors exhibited during the RCT that interfered with their ability to effectively participate in the group intervention format.
bParticipants enrolled in the final year of the trial were not offered the open label opportunity because intervention groups would not be available beyond the end of the study funding. They were offered an alternative self-guided treatment option.
Abbreviations: RCT (randomized controlled trial); HYP (hypnosis); MM (mindfulness meditation); ED (pain education); UTC (unable to contact)
